articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Irish Ambassador to DPRK
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Irish Ambassador to DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a conversation with Conor Murphy, outgoing Irish ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Dominican Republic
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Dominican Republic
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Friday sent a message of greetings to Leonel Fernandez Reyna, President of the Dominican Republic, on the occasion of the 165th anniversary of its independence. 
					 Kim in the message wished the president success in his work for the prosperity of the Dominican Republic and the well-being of its people.

articles.title: Message of Greetings to Moroccan FM
articles.content:
Message of Greetings to Moroccan FM
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister of the DPRK Pak Ui Chun sent a message of greetings to Al Taib Al Fassi Fahri, minister of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation of Morocco, on Feb. 13 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Morocco.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would expand and develop in the mutual interests, the message wished him success in his work.

articles.title: Greetings to FM of Slovak Republic
articles.content:
Greetings to FM of Slovak Republic
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister of the DPRK Pak Ui Chun on Feb. 6 sent a message of greetings to Miroslav Lajcak upon his appointment as foreign minister of the Slovak Republic.
					 The message expressed the belief that the traditional relations of cooperation between the DPRK and Slovakia would continue to develop in the future, too, and wished him success in his new job.

articles.title: Senior Chinese Official on Sino-DPRK Cultural Relations
articles.content:
Senior Chinese Official on Sino-DPRK Cultural Relations
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Liu Yandong, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and state councilor of the People's Republic of China, met the visiting DPRK government cultural delegation headed by Mun Jae Chol, acting chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, in Beijing on Thursday.
					She said that the Sino-DPRK cultural relations have developed in width and depth over the past half a century under the care of the leaders of the two countries.
					
					Noting that General Secretary Kim Jong Il has attached great importance to the cultural exchange between the two countries, she expressed the belief that the cultural cooperation and exchange would become more brisk under the deep concern of the top leaders of the two countries this year, a "year of Sino-DPRK friendship".
					
					She stressed that the Sino-DPRK friendship is the blood-sealed unbreakable friendship as it was provided by the leaders of the two countries.
					
					She noted that China is sincerely rejoiced over the fact that the revolutionary cause started by President Kim Il Sung has been successfully carried forward and is being brought to completion by Kim Jong Il.
					
					She expressed hope that the Korean people would register bigger successes in the struggle to build a great prosperous powerful socialist nation, united close around Kim Jong Il, true to the behests of the President.

articles.title: Egyptian Foreign Ministry Delegation Here
articles.content:
Egyptian Foreign Ministry Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Egypt led by Assistant Minister Hussein Haridy arrived here on Friday.

articles.title: 4th National Meeting of Agitators Closes
articles.content:
4th National Meeting of Agitators Closes
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The 4th National Meeting of Agitators was closed on Friday.
					 More speeches were made at the meeting.
					
					The speakers said that brisk activities to inform the people of the policies of the Workers' Party of Korea and agitation work now under way in every work site of socialist construction are the fruition of the experienced and tested leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il who put forward original theories and policies of information service and has energetically led the struggle to implement them.
					
					They referred to the fact that they have educated the masses by conducting effective political work and setting examples in the van of the struggle and advance and thus powerfully encouraged them in the general march of the Songun revolution.
					
					They underscored the need to dynamically conduct a political and ideological offensive to give full play to the might of ideology and inexhaustible mental power of all the servicepersons and people in hearty response to the militant tasks laid down in the congratulatory message of the WPK Central Committee and thus make a positive contribution to consolidating the single-minded unity of the whole society and cementing the politico-ideological position of Korean-style socialism.
					
					They expressed the will to intensify the agitation offensive in order to make the same spirit of creation and innovation as displayed in the days of the grand Chollima march prevail throughout the country and thus discharge their duties as ideological standard-bearers in the gigantic drive for building a great prosperous and powerful nation.

articles.title: Paektusan Cup Sports Contest Closed
articles.content:
Paektusan Cup Sports Contest Closed
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The Paektusan cup sports contest was closed with due ceremony at the Basketball Gymnasium in Chongchun Street on Friday.
					In the contest the April 25 Sports Group placed first in men's and women's basketball, women's volleyball and men's and women's table-tennis team events and the Amnokgang Sports Group in men's volleyball event.
					
					Present at the closing ceremony were officials concerned and sportspersons.
					
					Pak Hak Son, chairman of the Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission, said at the ceremony that all the players and coaches should thoroughly apply the Korean-style sporting principle and method and intensify their training to honor the DPRK in every international tournament.

articles.title: New Stamp Issued
articles.content:
New Stamp Issued
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- A new postage stamp (one individual stamp) was issued in commemoration of the 90th anniversary of the March First Popular Uprising in Korea.
					The March First Popular Uprising was an event of historic significance that dealt a heavy blow to the brutal Japanese imperialists through a nation-wide struggle of the Korean nation against the aggressors.
					
					Printed in the stamp with the letters "Commemoration of 90th Anniversary of March First Popular Uprising" on its upper part and letters "Juche 8 (1919)-Juche 98 (2009)" on its lower part is a picture showing the heroic features of Korean people who turn out in the struggle against the Japanese imperialists, shouting the slogan "Long Live the Korean Independence!"

articles.title: General Arboretum Comes into Being
articles.content:
General Arboretum Comes into Being
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- A general arboretum is being arranged with conspicuous features in the Ogasan Natural Reserve situated in the northern part of Korea.
					The arboretum is taking shape thanks to the efforts of the officials and employees of the Ogasan Natural Reserve Management Company.
					
					The area is located in a place where the northern distribution boundary line of broad-leaved woodland meets the southern distribution boundary line of needle-leaved woodland. The arboretum consists of five main districts and other districts suited to natural and geographical conditions of the Mt. Oga area and the characteristics of plant distribution.
					
					All sorts of woody plants growing in the reserve are being transplanted in the main districts according to their heights above sea level.
					
					And several districts for introducing new species of plants and the medicinal herbs fields are being made.
					
					Various plants absent in the Mt. Oga area are being planted in the districts for introducing new species of plants including the wild fruit-bearing plant district and oil-bearing tree district.
					
					Wild insam, Epimedium Koreanum, balloonflower, etc are striking roots in the medicinal herbs fields.

articles.title: Brisk Researches into Sea Culture
articles.content:
Brisk Researches into Sea Culture
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Scientific researches for developing sea culture are going on in high key in the DPRK.
					The Branch Academy of Fishery Science under the State Academy of Sciences is playing a big role in this work.
					
					All the institutes under the branch academy located on the seaside are engaged in the creation of seaweed and fish culture farms with oceanographic and hydrological conditions favorable to sea culture.
					
					Mixed fish culture being the main form of sea fish breeding, much effort is channeled to the solution of scientific and technological questions for three-dimensional fish breeding.
					
					Researches have been undertaken to obtain a new variety of tangle expected to raise productivity per unit area, establish such production processes as collection of fish eggs, larva breeding, fry breeding and medium breeding, cultivate early feed for its abundant supply and the development of a unique natural protein feed.
					
					Particular efforts are directed to researches into new feed additives.
					
					Following the successful development of artificial propagation technology of salmon, the branch academy is pushing ahead with researches for raising the survival and egg-laying rate of salmon and increasing the number of its fries freed in water.
					
					Also pushed forward are researches into the process of sea fish and weed.
					
					Researches are in swing for producing processed aquatic products such as foodstuffs and medicines from various species of fish and seaweed including tangle.
					
					Sin Sang Il, director of the Branch Academy of Fishery Science, said that the branch academy had achieved results in scientific researches in recent years, developing the technique of artificial egg-laying of delicious fish, obtaining a plant growth accelerant from tangle infusion, establishing a production process of microorganism ferment feed which is important in fish culture, and propagating hundreds of thousands of echinoderms and mollusks in culture farms.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign under Fire
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign under Fire
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The gentries of the "Grand National Party" of south Korea are now busy with the moves to get a "supra-partisan resolution" adopted at the "National Assembly to "check" someone's "provocation" and the "bill on the human rights in the north" passed through it.
					Rodong Sinmun Friday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					This is a shameless act reminding one of a thief crying "Stop the thief!" It is, at the same time, an undisguised challenge to the ideology and system of fellow countrymen and a revelation of the wild design to escalate the confrontation.
					
					Due to the puppet military going reckless to realize the ambition to invade the north, backed by foreign aggressor forces the inter-Korean military confrontation and tension have reached an extreme phase and there prevails such a dangerous situation on the Korean Peninsula that a war may break out there any moment. This is a hard reality.
					
					No matter how hard the group of traitors may float the hackneyed fiction about someone's "provocation" no one will believe it. 
					
					Being the worst human rights abusers in the world, the GNP gentries are impudent enough to make much ado about someone's "human rights issue" and getting frantic with the confrontation racket.
					
					Where no shame is, there is no fear. They are not entitled to talk about other's "human rights" and the like as they have reduced south Korea to a tundra of human rights and unhesitatingly committed such human right abuses as brutally killing people at the point of fascist bayonet.
					
					With nothing can they hide their criminal intention to justify the crimes they have committed by driving the inter-Korean ties to collapse and do harm to the DPRK by hatching sinister plots at any cost.
					
					The Lee group would be well advised to behave itself, bearing in mind that its escalated anti-DPRK smear campaign would bring into bolder relief its despicable true colors as traitors to the nation.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Policy of Confrontation with DPRK Assailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Policy of Confrontation with DPRK Assailed
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The Korean nation will never condone the crimes committed by the Lee Myung Bak group in the first year of its office but mete out a stern judgment of history to this group of traitors.
					Rodong Sinmun today warns this in a signed article.
					
					It continues:
					
					No sooner had Lee come to power than he put up the watchword "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars" as his "policy toward the north." 
					
					As recognized by the domestic and foreign public, the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula, the issue sparked by the United States, is not one between the north and the south but an issue between the DPRK and the U.S. as well as an international issue. 
					
					Nevertheless, the Lee group regarded the pressure upon "the north to dismantle its nuclear program first" as a keynote of the above-said policy, absurdly linking the inter-Korean relations with the nuclear issue, and allowed foreign forces to make the domestic issue of the nation a plaything and a bargaining chip for meeting their interests.
					
					The group has systematically brought to naught all the achievements made in the June 15 era of reunification, describing the above-said era as a "lost decade."
					
					The policy of confrontation with the DPRK pursued by the Lee Myung Bak regime is nothing but a war theory aimed at realizing its foolish wild dream to invade it as it led the situation on the peninsula to the brink of war. 
					
					All the Koreans have already declared the bankruptcy of the said policy as it is a major factor of bringing the inter-Korean relations to collapse. 
					
					This being a hard reality, the Lee group appointed Hyon In Thaek as puppet minister of Unification some days ago though he is the arch criminal who crafted the said-watchword. This betrayed its sinister intention to desperately pursue the treacherous "policy towards the north" with an eye to stand in confrontation with the DPRK to the last and ignite a war against it come what may. 
					
					 The reality clearly proves that the Koreans can neither expect the improved inter-Korean relations and reunification nor escape the holocaust of a nuclear war as long as Lee is allowed to stay in power. The root cause of a misfortune should be completely eliminated in time and the faster, the better, concludes the article.

articles.title: Adherence to Anti-imperialist Independent Stand Called for
articles.content:
Adherence to Anti-imperialist Independent Stand Called for
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Each country and nation should maintain a firm anti-imperialist independent stand and wage a dynamic united struggle to smash all the moves of the imperialists for domination.
					Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a signed article.
					
					The imperialists are increasing their political, economic and military pressure upon the anti-imperialist independent countries while staging large-scale smear campaigns against those countries in a bid to realize their wild ambition for domination and instigating anti-government forces to create and stoke the socio-political confusion, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					Their ulterior aim is to make the people in those countries waver ideologically and give up their revolutionary principle.
					
					The imperialists dare not provoke any people strong in faith.
					
					The completely different fate of the peoples of Cuba and Iraq teaches a lesson that if people of a country lack a transparent anti-imperialist independent stand, they are bound to become slaves of imperialism and can neither expect the independent development of their country and nation nor survive.
					
					The anti-imperialist independent forces are incomparably stronger than the imperialist forces. Now that the imperialists are colluding with one another and challenging the popular masses' cause of independence as an allied force, it is necessary for all anti-imperialist independent forces in the world to go united and stand against the imperialists.
					
					The nature of imperialism can never change. This means that imperialism never abandons its wild ambition to dominate other countries. That is why the anti-imperialist struggle should be carried on till its victory. At present the imperialists are vociferating about "reconciliation, cooperation and partnership" in a bid to cover up their hegemonic nature, but nobody will be taken in by this rhetoric.

articles.title: Number of Cases of Aerial Espionage against DPRK on Steady Increase
articles.content:
Number of Cases of Aerial Espionage against DPRK on Steady Increase
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the warmongers of the south Korean puppet army perpetrated madcap aerial espionage against the DPRK by massively mobilizing strategic and tactical reconnaissance planes with various missions in February, according to a military source.
					The U.S. imperialist aggression forces committed more than 110 cases while the south Korean puppet army more than 70 cases, at least 180 in all.
					
					The U.S. imperialist aggressor forces' U-2 based in south Korea was busy with photographing and electronic spying on the DPRK on Feb. 26 and 27. The number of cases of aerial espionage by this plane reached more than 20 this month. 
					
					An overseas-based RC-135 of the U.S. imperialists was also busy with aerial monitoring and photographing of the overall areas of the DPRK including its east coast on Feb. 21 and 24.
					
					The U.S. imperialists hurled overseas-based E-3 into the joint air battle exercises frantically staged in the sky above south Korea from Feb. 4 to 11. It was busy commanding flying corps involved in the exercises and conducting aerial espionage against the DPRK.
					
					On Feb. 24 the U.S. imperialists and warmongers of the south Korean puppet army let 17 strategic and tactical reconnaissance planes with various missions conduct intensive monitoring and electronic reconnaissance against the DPRK.
					
					The south Korean puppets mobilized 2-3 tactical reconnaissance planes every day for spying on the frontline areas of the DPRK side.
					
					The above-mentioned aerial espionage frantically perpetrated by them by using every possible means including spy satellites clearly indicates that their moves to invade the DPRK have reached an extremely reckless phase.

articles.title: Resignation of Minister of "Unification" Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Resignation of Minister of "Unification" Urged in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The Action Headquarters of the 17th-term south Korean Federation of University Student Councils issued a statement on Feb. 23 in demand of the resignation of the puppet minister of Unification, a die-hard anti-reunification element.
					The statement said that the appointment of Hyon In Thaek, an element advocating confrontation against reunification, as the minister of "Unification" is little short of the official declaration on their stand against reunification.
					
					The inter-Korean relations have been plunged into a touch-and-go crisis due to the confrontational move of the present regime, the statement pointed out, saying that it is hard to expect the improved inter-Korean relations as long as Hyon takes office as the minister of "Unification."
					
					It demanded that Hyon step down from power at once and the Lee Myung Bak regime come out to the implementation of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: More Vigorous Struggle for Independent Reunification Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
More Vigorous Struggle for Independent Reunification Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration in south Korea on Feb. 22 made public a special resolution under the title "Let's defend and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration to bring earlier the independent reunification."
					 The resolution said that all the fellow countrymen are now astonished at the treacherous and anti-reunification moves of Lee Myung Bak driving the inter-Korean relations into the worst phase of confrontation.
					
					 It charged that Lee bedeviled the inter-Korean relations with the concept of extreme confrontation that "it is the ultimate goal to unify the country under the liberal democratic system" and is escalating military threat to the north in league with foreign forces while turning his back on the nation and getting frantic in suppression of the progressive forces.
					
					There is nothing to expect from the present regime which is making the south Korean society pro-U.S. conservative and driving it into confrontation with the DPRK, it said, and went on:
					
					 We should counter the anti-reunification moves of the Lee Myung Bak regime with the nationwide reunification offensive and its suppression with the more vigorous struggle for unity.
					
					 The independent reunification, the requirement of the times and the desire of the people, can never be checked no matter how despicably and desperately such anti-reunification maniacs as Lee are working.
					
					Let us advance, holding higher the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, the banner of independent reunification, peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Bellicose Forces' Anti-DPRK War Moves Flailed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Bellicose Forces' Anti-DPRK War Moves Flailed in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea held the 87th rally for peace and disarmament in Seoul on Feb. 24 at which it demanded an immediate stop to the large-scale war moves for aggression on the DPRK.
					A resolution, read out at the rally, noted that the military authorities are contemplating staging Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises from March 9 to 20 in league with the U.S.
					
					The war exercises involving at least 26,000 U.S. troops and other huge armed forces and latest war hardware including nuclear-powered aircraft carrier are precisely exercises aimed to attack the DPRK under "OPLAN 5027," a scenario for a nuclear war for aggression on it, the resolution charged.
					
					It went on:
					
					Timing to be coincided with such scheme, Minister of "National Defence" Ri Sang Hui unhesitatingly let loose a spate of outbursts that "the south would strike the north," while talking about "provocation" of someone.
					
					The deteriorated inter-Korean relations and the increasing crisis of war in the Korean Peninsula are attributable to the Lee Myung Bak regime which is resorting to the war and confrontation moves after totally denying the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					The resolution called upon all the people to turn out in the struggle for peace against war to frustrate the moves for war exercises against the DPRK.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Policy to Bring Agriculture to Ruin Flayed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Policy to Bring Agriculture to Ruin Flayed
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Members of the Federation of Peasants Associations and other peasants organizations of south Korea held a rally in Seoul on Feb. 25 to denounce the policy pursued by the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors to bring agriculture to ruin in the first year of its office.
					In a resolution adopted there they condemned Lee Myung Bak for having followed American-style neo-liberalism and consistently pursued the policy for bringing agriculture to bankruptcy and bringing benefits to the rich only in the above-said period. 
					
					They declared that the peasants would actively turn out in the struggle to win food sovereignty, a struggle to deter the present regime from rendering agriculture bankrupt and protect the lives and security of the people.

articles.title: White Paper on Lee Myung Bak Regime's Misdeeds Published in S. Korea
articles.content:
White Paper on Lee Myung Bak Regime's Misdeeds Published in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Progress, the Bar Association for Democratic Society, the Confederation of Trade Unions, the Citizens' Solidarity for Democratic Society, the Society of Student Parents for True Education, the Federation of Peasants Associations and other civic and public organizations of south Korea held a joint press conference in Seoul on Feb. 25 at which they published a white paper on the Lee Myung Bak regime's misdeeds in the first year of its office.
					Speakers at the press conference recalled that civic and public organizations of various circles issued a white paper in which they laid bare the course characterized by lies, deception and crimes covered by the Lee Myung Bak "government" and the "Grand National Party" over the last one year since they came to power. 
					
					They charged that under the present "government" the people's living has further deteriorated, democracy has been violated and the inter-Korean relations have been pushed to the crisis of total severance.
					
					They stressed that the white paper warned the dictatorial regime against having violated the democracy in society, suppressed assemblies and demonstrations by violence and driven the inter-Korean relations to the phase of military conflict.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Mongolia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Mongolia
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction" was brought out in booklet by the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development on Feb. 13.
					 The work, published on June 19, Juche 86 (1997), clarifies the idea that to preserve the Juche character and national character of the revolution and construction is the basic principle which should be maintained in the efforts to accomplish the socialist cause, and the tasks and ways for carrying it into practice.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Popular Traits Lauded in Italy
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Popular Traits Lauded in Italy
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Miriam Pelegrini Feri, president of the Group of Dialectical Materialists of Italy, released a statement titled "Leader Kim Jong Il devoting his all to the people" on Feb. 17 on the occasion of Kim Jong Il's birthday.
					 Saying that Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, is the leader of the people as he dedicates all his life to them, the statement stressed that he always attaches top priority to the people's interests and shares bitters and sweets with the people, finding himself among them.
					
					 He has visited every nook and corner of the country, including factories and farms, without having rest even in red-letter days and holidays to improve the standard of people's living while indicating the orientation and ways to bring about a productive surge in all fields of the national economy, the statement noted.
					
					 It recalled that he formulated as the three charters for Korea's reunification the three principles of national reunification, the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo advanced by President Kim Il Sung and that the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration were adopted thanks to his experienced and tested leadership.

articles.title: Events Held in Countries to Mark February Holiday
articles.content:
Events Held in Countries to Mark February Holiday
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Meetings and film shows took place in Germany, Bulgaria, Ecuador and India and a meeting, a seminar, an explanatory session and a ceremony of opening the week of book and photo exhibition in various units of Uganda between Feb. 11 and 16 to celebrate the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					Displayed in the venues of the meetings were photos showing the undying Songun leadership feats of Kim Jong Il and books and photos introducing the advantages of the socialist system in the DPRK.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meetings.
					
					A vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Germany noted that 
						Kim Jong Il has led socialism in the DPRK to victory with his original Songun policy by creditably carrying forward the revolutionary cause of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					Konstantin Dimitrov, chairman of Khaskovo Provincial Committee of the Bulgarian Anti-Fascist Union, said that Korean-style socialism winning victory after victory under the wise leadership of 
						Kim Jong Il has become the beacon of hope for the progressive humankind desirous of socialism.
					
					 S. N. Sserwanga, secretary general of the African Regional Committee of Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People, praised Kim Jong Il as a defender and guide of the cause of justice, stressing: The DPRK blessed with the great leader will prosper forever and continue to inspiringly encourage us, standing in the van of the struggle for the cause of global independence.
					
					Rose Najjemba Muyinda, chairperson of the Ugandan National Women's Council, said at the ceremony of opening the week of book and photo exhibition that under the wise leadership of
						Kim Jong Il the Korean people further hardened the single-minded unity of the whole society which can never be found in any other country and made signal progress under so difficult conditions, reliably defending the sovereignty of the country.
					
					 The participants in the film show held in Germany watched Korean film introducing Kim Jong Il's old home in the Paektusan secret camp.
					
					 Messages of greetings to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the meetings held in Germany and Bulgaria.

articles.title: Clausurada IV Conferencia Nacional de Agitadores
articles.content:
Clausurada IV Conferencia Nacional de Agitadores
Pyongyang, 27 de febrero (ATCC) -- Continuaron las intervenciones en la IV Conferencia Nacional de Agitadores, que fue clausurada este viernes.
					Los oradores subrayaron que hoy dia, se despliegan activamente en los lugares de la construccion socialista la propaganda de las politicas del partido y las actividades de agitacion para ejecutarlas.
					
					Esta realidad -prosiguieron- es el resultado de la probada y diestra guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien presento las originales teorias y orientaciones de la agitacion y dirige incansablemente las labores para ponerlas en practica.
					
					Recordaron la trayectoria del pasado en que al frente de la lucha y la marcha, vinieron educando a las masas con la dinamica labor politica y el ejemplo personal y estimulandolas a la marcha general de la revolucion del Songun.
					
					Expresaron la determinacion de contribuir activamente al fortalecimiento de la unidad monolitica de toda la sociedad y de la trinchera ideo-politica del socialismo al estilo coreano al lanzar una intensa ofensiva ideo-politica, en cumplimiento de las tareas combativas presentadas en el mensaje de felicitacion del CC del PTC, para poner de pleno manifiesto el poderio ideologico y la inagotable potencia espiritual de todos los militares y habitantes. 
					
					Mediante la intensificacion de la agitacion, haremos reinar en todo el pais el clima de creaciones e innovaciones, que fue implantado en el periodo de la gran marcha Chollima, y cumpliremos asi nuestro deber de abanderados ideologicos en la gran batalla para construir una gran potencia prospera, concluyeron.

articles.title: Clausurada Competencia Deportiva por Copa Paektusan
articles.content:
Clausurada Competencia Deportiva por Copa Paektusan
Pyongyang, 27 de febrero (ATCC) -- Quedo clausurada la Competencia Deportiva por la Copa Paektusan en una ceremonia que tuvo lugar el dia 27 en el Centro de Baloncesto del Reparto Chongchun con la participacion de los funcionarios correspondientes y los deportistas.
					En este evento el Conjunto Deportivo 25 de Abril ocupo el primer lugar en el baloncesto masculino y el femenino, el voleibol femenino y el certamen colectivo de ping-pong de ambos sexos mientras el Conjunto Deportivo Amnokgang resulto ganador solo en el voleibol masculino.
					
					En su discurso de clausura el presidente del Comite de Direccion de Deportes de Corea, Pak Hak Son, dijo que todos los deportistas y entrenadores deben aplicar consecuentemente el principio y metodos de juego al estilo coreano y entrenar con mucho mas sudor para colocar en lo mas alto de la asta la bandera de la RPDC en los torneos internacionales.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena politica de enfrentamiento de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena politica de enfrentamiento de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 27 de febrero (ATCC) -- La nacion coreana no perdonara jamas los crimenes cometidos por la banda de Lee Myung Bak en un ano de su mandato y la sometera al severo castigo de la historia.
					Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual del dia 27 y continua:
					
					Tan pronto como tomara el "poder", el traidor Lee presento como su "politica sobre el Norte" la teoria de "desnuclearizacion, apertura y 3000 dolares".
					
					Tanto los nacionales como los extranjeros reconocen que el problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana generado por Estados Unidos no es un asunto entre ambas partes coreanas sino entre la RPDC y EE.UU. y una cuestion internacional.
					
					Pero, al vincular ilogicamente las relaciones Norte-Sur con el problema nuclear, la banda de Lee toma la teoria de la "renuncia de armas nucleares por el Norte, primero" como lo clave de la "politica sobre el Norte" y convirtio asi los asuntos internos de la nacion en un objeto de regateo para satisfacer los intereses de las fuerzas foraneas.
					
					Ella invalido de manera sistematica los exitos logrados en la epoca de reunificacion iniciada el 15 de junio insultando atrevidamente este periodo como "10 anos perdidos".
					
					La politica conflictiva con la RPDC del "poder" de Lee deviene la criminal doctrina de guerra para realizar su absurda ambicion de agredir a ella y el factor que llevo al borde de guerra la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Toda la nacion coreana condeno al fracaso esa politica, que ha sido la causa de la ruptura de las relaciones N-S.
					
					Sin embargo, al nombrar recientemente como ministro de Reunificacion a Hyon In Thaek, artifice de la teoria de "desnuclearizacion, apertura y 3000 dolares", la camarilla de Lee revelo abiertamente su intencion de obstinarse en su antinacional "politica sobre el Norte", enfrentarse hasta el fin con la RPDC y provocar a toda costa la guerra contra esta.
					
					La realidad demuestra claramente que al dejar intacto al traidor Lee, la nacion coreana no podra esperar la mejora de las relaciones Norte-Sur ni la reunificacion sino tendra que sufrir los desastres de guerra nuclear.
					
					Hay que eliminar lo mas pronto posible la fuente de los desastres.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena nuevo complot anti-RPDC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena nuevo complot anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 27 de febrero (ATCC) -- En estos dias, los compinches del "Gran Partido Nacional" del Sur de Corea aprueban la "resolucion ultrapartidista de la Asamblea Nacional" para "frenar la provocacion" de alguien y la "ley de DDHH del Norte de Corea".
					Esta conducta tan descarada de bandido significa un abierto desafio a la idea y al regimen del connacional Norte y una muestra del extremado afan de enfrentarse con este.
					
					 Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este viernes y continua:
					
					Debido al circulo militar titere del Sur de Corea que actua demencialmente para realizar su ambicion de agredir al Norte con el apoyo de las fuerzas agresoras extranjeras, llegan al extremo el enfrentamiento militar y la tension Norte-Sur y se ha dado ahora la coyuntura tan peligrosa que puede desatar la guerra en cualquier momento.
					
					 Por mucho que los traidores hablen de la ya aburrida teoria de "provocacion" de alguien, nadie les hara caso.
					
					 Los compinches del "Gran Partido Nacional", que son los violadores de DDHH de pesima calana en este mundo, intensifican la campana de confrontacion con el Norte cuestionando cinicamente el problema de DDHH que realmente no hay.
					
					Esos tipejos suelen violar los DDHH asesinando con el sable del fascismo a los habitantes surcoreanos y convirtiendo asi el suelo surcoreano en la tierra privada de DDHH.
					
					Ellos no podran ocultar de ninguna manera su intencion criminal de justificar su crimen de haber roto las relaciones con el Norte y hacer dano a este con intrigas y complots.
					
					La banda de Lee debe actuar con prudencia al darse cuenta de que sus complots anti-RPDC mostraran solo su virulenta fachada de traicion a la nacion.
